name: getContextsForField
description:
Returns a [paginated](#pagination) list of [ contexts](https://confluence.atlassian.com/adminjiracloud/what-are-custom-field-contexts-991923859.html) for a custom field. Contexts can be returned as follows:

 *  With no other parameters set, all contexts.
 *  By defining `id` only, all contexts from the list of IDs.
 *  By defining `isAnyIssueType`, limit the list of contexts returned to either those that apply to all issue types (true) or those that apply to only a subset of issue types (false)
 *  By defining `isGlobalContext`, limit the list of contexts return to either those that apply to all projects (global contexts) (true) or those that apply to only a subset of projects (false).

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

isAnyIssueType.description: Whether to return contexts that apply to all issue types.

isGlobalContext.description: Whether to return contexts that apply to all projects.

contextId.description: The list of context IDs. To include multiple contexts, separate IDs with ampersand: `contextId=10000&contextId=10001`.

startAt.description: The index of the first item to return in a page of results (page offset).

maxResults.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

$ul: **isLast**: Whether this is the last page.
**maxResults**: The maximum number of items that could be returned.
**nextPage**: If there is another page of results, the URL of the next page.
**startAt**: The index of the first item returned.
